name: Luminous Combat
description: Luminous Combat is a fast-paced multiplayer game in which players compete for points by shooting the level. The player/team with the most points at the end of the match, wins.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 700 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires broadband internet connection for Online multiplayer
